DOC.brief_title: Effects Sourdough Fermented Rye Crisp Bread Appetite Postprandial Metabolic Responses
DOC.detailed_description: Two commercial whole grain rye crisp bread process differently ( unfermented sourdough ferment ) refine wheat control product test study . The rye crisp bread product contain similar ingredient . All product provide similar amount available carbohydrate ( 30g ) . The total amount test product 50-60g . The specific primary aim study : To conduct short-term breakfast intervention study human ( n = 24 ) compare effect 2 high-fiber rye crisp bread product process different way ( sourdough ferment unfermented ) refine wheat control crisp bread part normal breakfast self-rated appetite , postprandial glucose insulin concentration . Difference post-prandial insulin response product primary endpoint . Secondary aim ( conduct significant effect primary endpoint demonstrate ) : To assess change hormone relation self-perceived satiety , hunger desire eat difference chemical microstructural composition test food .
DOC.criteria: BMI 18.530 kg/m2 fast plasma glucose < 6.0 mmol/L , fast serum insulin < 11 mE/L serum TSH < 2.5 mIE/L plasma LDL < 5.3 mmol/L fast plasma triglyceride ( pTG ) < 1.8 mmol/L habitual consumption breakfast , lunch dinner smoker use medication likely affect appetite medical condition involve gastrointestinal tract gluten intolerance food allergy physical problem eat diet selfreported fluctuation body weight 10 % three month prior screen recent participation dietary study pregnancy lactation
